title: Login form validation not working on Safari
description: Users are able to submit the login form with empty fields on Safari browser, but validation works correctly on Chrome and Firefox.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Open Safari browser
2. Navigate to login page
3. Click submit without entering credentials
actualBehavior: Form submits and redirects to error page

title: Dashboard charts not loading on mobile devices
description: The analytics charts on the dashboard fail to render properly on mobile devices with screen width less than 768px.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Login to the application
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Resize browser to mobile viewport or use mobile device
expectedBehavior: Charts should resize and display properly

title: Memory leak in user profile component
description: The user profile component appears to have a memory leak that causes browser performance degradation after extended use.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Navigate to user profile page
2. Edit profile information multiple times
3. Monitor browser memory usage

title: File upload progress bar not updating
description: When uploading large files, the progress bar remains at 0% throughout the upload process, even though the upload completes successfully.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Go to file upload section
2. Select a file larger than 50MB
3. Click upload and observe progress bar
expectedBehavior: Progress bar should show upload percentage
actualBehavior: Progress bar stays at 0% but upload succeeds

title: Search functionality returns incorrect results
description: The global search feature returns results that don't match the search query, particularly when searching for partial words or phrases.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Use the global search bar
2. Enter partial word like 'proj'
3. Review search results
actualBehavior: Returns unrelated items or no results

title: Dark mode toggle not persisting across sessions
description: When users enable dark mode and then log out and back in, the application reverts to light mode instead of remembering the preference.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Enable dark mode
2. Log out of the application
3. Log back in

title: API timeout errors during peak hours
description: Users experience frequent API timeout errors between 2-4 PM EST, particularly when loading the main dashboard and user data.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Login during peak hours (2-4 PM EST)
2. Navigate to dashboard
3. Observe loading times and error messages
actualBehavior: Frequent timeout errors and 10+ second load times

title: Email notifications not sending for high priority tickets
description: Email notifications are not being sent to assigned developers when high or critical priority tickets are created or updated.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Create a high priority ticket
2. Assign to a developer
3. Check if email notification is sent

title: Date picker shows incorrect month on iOS Safari
description: The date picker component displays the wrong month when opened on iOS Safari browser, showing the previous month instead of the current one.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Open application on iOS Safari
2. Navigate to any form with date picker
3. Click on date field to open picker

title: User avatar images not loading from CDN
description: Profile avatar images are failing to load from the CDN, showing broken image placeholders throughout the application.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Login to application
2. Navigate to any page showing user avatars
3. Observe image loading behavior

title: Pagination controls missing on ticket list page
description: The ticket list page shows all tickets at once without pagination controls, causing performance issues when there are many tickets.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Navigate to ticket list page
2. Observe page performance and scroll behavior
expectedBehavior: Should show paginated results with navigation controls
actualBehavior: All tickets load at once, causing slow performance

title: Keyboard navigation broken in ticket filters
description: Users cannot navigate through the ticket filter dropdown menus using keyboard arrows and tab keys, making the interface inaccessible.
stepsToReproduce:
1. Navigate to ticket list page
2. Try to use tab/arrow keys to navigate filters
3. Attempt to select options with Enter key
